sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"机会"之意。
means: chance ： 侧重指偶然或意外的机会，有时也指正常或好的机会。
opportunity ： 侧重指有利或适合于采取行动，以达到某一目的或实现某种愿望的最佳时机或机会。
occasion ： 指特殊时机或良机，也指时节。

sentence.Network_en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
sentence.Network_cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

sentence.Network_en: The opportunity had gone. His mind scrabbled for alternatives.
sentence.Network_cn: 机会已经失去。他苦苦思索别的方案。

sentence.Network_en: First-generation Americans view the United States as a land of golden opportunity.
sentence.Network_cn: 第一代美国人认为美国是一个充满了机遇的国度。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French opportunite, from Latin opportunitas, from opportunus (see opportune)

entry.def: An opportunity is a situation in which it is possible for you to do something that you want to do.

example.ex: I had an opportunity to go to New York and study...
example.tran: 我曾经有一个去纽约学习的机会。

example.ex: The best reason for a trip to London is the super opportunity for shopping...
example.tran: 绝佳的购物机会是前往伦敦的最好理由。

means.word_mean: 1. a possibility due to a favorable combination of circumstances;

sentences.sentence: "the holiday gave us the opportunity to visit Washington"

auth_sentence.content: The album was an opportunity for Bell to experiment.
auth_sentence.res_content: The album was an opportunity for Bell to experiment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The album was an opportunity for Bell to experiment.

auth_sentence.content: It's incredible for me to have this opportunity.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's incredible for me to have this opportunity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's incredible for me to have this opportunity.

auth_sentence.content: The first opportunity we see is in remote control.
auth_sentence.res_content: The first opportunity we see is in remote control.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The first opportunity we see is in remote control.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,表示"某种性质,状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: absurd荒谬的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.荒谬

stems_affixes.value_cn: 权威,威信,权威人士,权力
stems_affixes.word_buile: author创造者+ity某种性质,状态等→n.权威,威信,权威人士,权力
electric电的+ity某种性质,状态等→电,电流

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性
stems_affixes.word_buile: equal相等的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性

stems_affixes.value_cn: 熟悉,通晓,亲密,熟悉,精通
stems_affixes.word_buile: familiar熟悉的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.熟悉,通晓,亲密,熟悉,精通
frugal节约的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.节约,节俭
genial亲切的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.和蔼,温和
infirm弱的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.虚弱
mendac说谎+ity某种性质,状态等→n.虚假
opportune凑巧的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.机会,时机
prob测试,证明+ity某种性质,状态等→[人]经得起证明和试验
rigid刚硬的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.固执,坚定,僵化
san健康的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.神志清楚
simpl=simple简单的+ic+ity某种性质,状态等→n.简单,简易,朴素,直率
venal贪财的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.唯利是图

Sentence.sentence: The ability to draw upon every available tool and insight—picked up from science, arts, and technology—to solve the problems of the future, and take advantage of the opportunities that present themselves, will be helpful to them and the United States.
Seize opportunities to tap their potential
What career opportunities her company can offer.

sentences.en: He sought opportunities of doing her little service.
sentences.cn: 他寻找机会为她尽一点力。

jushi.english: An opportunity like that doesn't often come my way.
jushi.chinese: 这样的机会可不常落在我头上。

jushi.english: When the opportunity came, I seized it with both hands.
jushi.chinese: 当机会来临时，我双手抓住了它。

jushi.english: According to some people, great opportunity and great danger are two sides of the same coin.
jushi.chinese: 在有些人看来,好机会也就意味着大风险,这不过是同一事物的两面罢了。
